question.title: OpenApi-generator, how to achieve similar behaviour as with @JsonSerialize(customSerialized)?
question.body: I try to use OpenApi generated (spring generator) DTOs in a project (instead of handwritten DTOs), however some existing DTOs have custom serializers, e.g. @JsonSerialize(using = TwoDecimalSerializer.class) (as you may guess, serializer saves only 2 digits after a point). How to achieve similar behaviour with OpenApiGenerator generated code? is it possible to somehow add those annotations? or the only way is to move that kind of code to mappers ?
